channel.title: Hungary on Jay Cromwell
channel.description: Recent content in Hungary on Jay Cromwell

item.title: Budapest, Hungary
item.description: Budapest - February 2019 I could go on and on about Budapest, my favorite city in the world so far, but I’ll try to keep it short-ish. We took the train from Vienna and travelling through the countryside, and well, it is pretty much what you’d imagine the Hungarian countryside to look like. Lots of nothing and the few towns and cities had a prevelant communism influence with un-maintained, large concrete buildings.
